verses.verse: And David <S%H1732><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Is there <S%H3426><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> any <S%H834><s%> that is left <S%H3498><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Saul, <S%H7586><s%> that I may show <S%H6213><s%> <S%H5973><s%> him kindness <S%H2617><s%> for Jonathan's <S%H3129><s%> sake? <S%H5668><s%>

And there was of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> a servant <S%H5650><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Ziba. <S%H6717><s%> And when they had called <S%H7121><s%> him unto <S%H413><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Art thou <S%H859><s%> Ziba? <S%H6717><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> is he.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Is there not <S%H657><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> any <S%H376><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Saul, <S%H7586><s%> that I may show <S%H6213><s%> the kindness <S%H2617><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> him? And Ziba <S%H6717><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> hath yet <S%H5750><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> which is lame <S%H5223><s%> on his feet. <S%H7272><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Where <S%H375><s%> is he? <S%H1931><s%> And Ziba <S%H6717><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Machir, <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammiel, <S%H5988><s%> in Lo-debar. <S%H3810><s%>

Then king <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> sent, <S%H7971><s%> and fetched <S%H3947><s%> him out of the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of Machir, <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammiel, <S%H5988><s%> from Lo-debar. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3810><s%>

Now when Mephibosheth, <S%H4648><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Saul, <S%H7586><s%> was come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> he fell <S%H5307><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> his face, <S%H6440><s%> and did reverence. <S%H7812><s%> And David <S%H1732><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Mephibosheth. <S%H4648><s%> And he answered, <S%H559><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> thy servant! <S%H5650><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Fear <S%H3372><s%> not: <S%H408><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I will surely show <S%H6213><s%> <S%H6213><s%> <S%H5973><s%> thee kindness <S%H2617><s%> for Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> thy father's <S%H1><s%> sake, <S%H5668><s%> and will restore <S%H7725><s%> thee <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H7704><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> thy father; <S%H1><s%> and thou <S%H859><s%> shalt eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> my table <S%H7979><s%> continually. <S%H8548><s%>

And he bowed himself, <S%H7812><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> is thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou shouldest look <S%H6437><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> such <S%H834><s%> a dead <S%H4191><s%> dog <S%H3611><s%> as I <S%H3644><s%> am?

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Ziba, <S%H6717><s%> Saul's <S%H7586><s%> servant, <S%H5288><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, I have given <S%H5414><s%> unto thy master's <S%H113><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> pertained <S%H1961><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> his house. <S%H1004><s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> therefore, and thy sons, <S%H1121><s%> and thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> shall till <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> for him, and thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> in the fruits, that thy master's <S%H113><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> may have <S%H1961><s%> food <S%H3899><s%> to eat: <S%H398><s%> but Mephibosheth <S%H4648><s%> thy master's <S%H113><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> always <S%H8548><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> my table. <S%H7979><s%> Now Ziba <S%H6717><s%> had fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> servants. <S%H5650><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Ziba <S%H6717><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> According to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> his servant, <S%H5650><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> shall thy servant <S%H5650><s%> do. <S%H6213><s%> As for Mephibosheth, <S%H4648><s%> said the king, he shall eat <S%H398><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> my table, <S%H7979><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> of the king's sons. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H4428><s%>

And Mephibosheth <S%H4648><s%> had a young <S%H6996><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Micha. <S%H4316><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> that dwelt <S%H4186><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ziba <S%H6717><s%> were servants <S%H5650><s%> unto Mephibosheth. <S%H4648><s%>

So Mephibosheth <S%H4648><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> table; <S%H7979><s%> and was lame <S%H6455><s%> on both <S%H8147><s%> his feet. <S%H7272><s%>
